item.title: Wer nicht vorwärts geht, der kommt zurücke
item.description:
Wer nicht vorwärts geht, der kommt zurücke

Goethe's father, Johann Caspar Goethe, lived with his family in a large house in Frankfurt, then an Imperial Free City of the Holy Roman Empire. Though he had studied law in Leipzig and had been appointed Imperial Councillor, he was not involved in the city's official affairs.

item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...

item.title: Winners of the 2015 iPhone Photography Awards Announced
item.description:
Winners of the 2015 iPhone Photography Awards Announced

NEW YORK - June 15, 2015 - The iPhone Photography Awards™ (IPPAWARDS) is proud to announce the winners of the 8th Annual Awards. They were selected from thousands of entries submitted by iPhone photographers from 120 countries around the world.

item.title: A Disney space station? It no longer seems like such a goofy idea
item.description:
A Disney space station? It no longer seems like such a goofy idea

Throughout our planet's space-faring history, there have been two major impediments to putting a lot of private citizens into orbit. Only governments have had spacecraft, and there have been only a few, government-controlled, space stations to visit. But now that may finally changing in a big way.
